Dialogue.string: Quite the journey you've had, prisoner. But all roads lead back to me, it seems.
Dialogue.speaker: true

ResponseA.string: This road leads out of here, and I'm taking it.

ResponseB.string: I'm closer to freedom than you think.

Dialogue.string: You're confident. But confidence won't get you past these gates.
Dialogue.speaker: true

ResponseB.string: How do I get out of here?

Dialogue.string: Freedom? Running from one trap to another doesn't count as freedom. You've only made things more complicated.
Dialogue.speaker: true

ResponseB.string: How do I get out of here?

Dialogue.string: Do you really think you're the first to reach this point? Many have tried.
Dialogue.speaker: true

ResponseA.string: And I'll be the first to succeed.

Dialogue.string: Every one of them thought the same. Every one of them failed.
Dialogue.speaker: true

Dialogue.string: That's what they all said. But they all ended up back where they started.
Dialogue.speaker: true

Dialogue.string: This isn't a story with a happy ending. You're still trapped, whether you realize it or not.
Dialogue.speaker: true

Dialogue.string: You can write whatever you want, but the city only reads one outcome: FAILURE.
Dialogue.speaker: true

Dialogue.string: Nothing to lose? Then you've already lost more than you realize. The city's grip is unrelenting.
Dialogue.speaker: true

Dialogue.string: This could've gone differently, you know. But you made your choice.
Dialogue.speaker: true

ResponseA.string: I made the only choice I had.

ResponseB.string: I'm ready for whatever comes next.

Dialogue.string: Then prepare to face the consequences of that choice.
Dialogue.speaker: true

ResponseA.string: I made the only choice I had.

ResponseB.string: I’m ready for whatever comes next.

Dialogue.string: Are you? Few are truly prepared for what lies ahead.
Dialogue.speaker: true

ResponseA.string: I made the only choice I had.

ResponseB.string: I’m ready for whatever comes next.

Dialogue.string: Enough talk. Let's see if you can back up your bravado.
Dialogue.speaker: true

ResponseA.string: I made the only choice I had.

ResponseB.string: I’m ready for whatever comes next.
